dt-option.name: columns.searchPanes.collapse
dt-option.summary: Allow the SearchPanes to be collapsed for specific columns

type.description: By setting the `-init columns.searchPanes.collapse` option to `false` the searchpane for this column will not be collapsible and the collapse button will not be shown at the top of the pane.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init columns.searchPanes.collapse` parameter is `true`, meaning that as standard the searchpanes are all collapsible.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will be collapsible. A button is shown on the control row above the SearchPane table and the right most button toggles the state of the pane from being collapsed to expanded.
If this option is set to false the pane for this column will not be collapsible and the button will not be shown. It is possible to set this for all columns using the `-init searchPanes.collapse` option, and the SearchPanes can be initialised in the collapsed state by using the `-init searchPanes.initCollapsed` or `-init columns.searchPanes.initCollapsed` options.

example.title: Don't allow SearchPanes to be collapsible on a specific column
